card.name: Crystal Zweilancer
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Liquid People. ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Dorballom, Lord of Demons
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Demon Commands. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy all creatures except darkness creatures. Then each player puts all non-darkness cards in their mana zone into their graveyard.

card.name: Diablost, the Shady General
card.text: ■ Each of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone gets "blocker". ''(Whenever one of your creatures attacks, your opponent may tap a creature that has "blocker" to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)'' ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Bolberg Cross Dragon
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ You may cross your cross gear in the battle zone with this creature For No Cost

card.name: Elupheus, Lord of Spirits
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Angel Commands. ■ Your opponent's creatures are put into the battle zone tapped. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Dione
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Creatures that have "speed attacker" can't attack on the turn they are put. ■ This creature can't attack.

card.name: Endless Puppet, Lord of Magic
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Death Puppets. ■ Whenever your opponent discards cards from their hand, you may draw the same number of discarded cards.

card.name: Necrodragon Zanjibar
card.text: ■ Each of your opponent's tapped creatures in the battle zone gets -2000 power. ''(A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)''

card.name: Shaman Totem
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each race you have in the battle zone other than Mystery Totem.

card.name: Moritz, the Spydroid
card.text: ■ Metamorph

card.name: Cabalt, the Patroller
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand. Your opponent discards all darkness and fire spells from it.

card.name: Mestapo, the Patroller
card.text: ■ No one can look through decks. ■ When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

card.name: Apocalypse Day
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ If there are 6 or more creatures in the battle zone, destroy all of them.

card.name: Triple Brain
card.text: ■ Draw up to 3 cards.

card.name: Typhoon Bazooka
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ When the crossed creature is attacking your opponent and isn't blocked, you may return a creature in the battle zone to its owner's hand.

card.name: Bangren, Ancient Arhat
card.text: ■ Each of your opponent's tapped creatures in the battle zone gets -1000 power. ''(A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)''

card.name: Gummer, Assassination Doll
card.text: ■ Tap Ability

card.name: Time Tripper, Shadow of Stagnation
card.text: ■ Whenever your opponent's puts a card into their mana zone, tap it.

card.name: Crimson Back Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have "blocker" and power 3000 or less.

card.name: Hell's Scrapper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

card.name: Evolution Blueprint
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Reveal the top 6 cards of your deck. Put all evolution creatures from among them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Irvine, the Spydroid
card.text: ■ Metamorph

card.name: Parshia, the Explorer
card.text: ■ While all cards in your mana zone are light cards, this creature gets +2500 power and "Blocker". ''(Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)''

card.name: Glory Stone
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ If your opponent has more cards in their mana zone than you have in yours, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Shining Defense
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ The crossed creature gets +1500 power and "blocker".

card.name: Starbase Lunatron
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack.

card.name: Deep Juggler
card.text: ■ While all cards in your mana zone are water cards, this creature gets +1000 power. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, if all cards in your mana zone are water cards, draw a card.

card.name: Zamaru, Treasure of Darkness
card.text: ■ While all cards in your mana zone are darkness cards, this creature gets +2000 power. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, if all cards in your mana zone are darkness cards, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.

card.name: Tragic Swamp
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's tapped creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -3000 power until the End Step

card.name: Zyler's Lighter
card.text: ■ While all cards in your mana zone are fire cards, this creature gets +1000 power and "speed attacker".

card.name: Chitta Peloru
card.text: ■ All Dragons in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures.

card.name: Brock, the Screw Soldier
card.text: ■ This creature gets -1000 power for each light or water creature in the battle zone. ''(A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)''

card.name: Drill Bowgun
card.text: ■ Choose one of your opponent's cross gear and put it into its owner's graveyard. Then if the creature that was crossed with that cross gear has power 2000 or less, destroy that creature.

card.name: Crimson Rifle
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ Instead of having the crossed creature attack, you may tap it to use this Tap ability. :Tap Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

card.name: Cloud Mayfly
card.text: ■ While all cards in your mana zone are nature cards, this creature gets +4000 power, "Double breaker", and can't be blocked by creatures that have power 5000 or less.

card.name: Faerie Gift
card.text: ■ This turn, the next creature you summon may cost up to 3 less. It can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Malta, the Oracle
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Bix, Guardian of the Sacred Mountain
card.text: ■ Saver

card.name: Cubela, the Oracle
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Martial Law
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's cross gear in the battle zone and put it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Reverse Armor
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ End Step

card.name: Rosa Rossa
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack.

card.name: Spiritual Water
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ You may draw a card for each of your opponent's tapped creatures in the battle zone.

card.name: Invisible Suit
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ The crossed creature gets +1000 power and can't be blocked.

card.name: Western Barrel, Shadow of Riots
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card from their hand.

card.name: Bloody Cymbal
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy it.

card.name: Quake Staff
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ The crossed creature gets "slayer". ''(Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)''

card.name: Explosion Lizard
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Power Attacker

card.name: Pyuzero, Prince of the South Wind
card.text: ■ This creature attacks each turn if able. ■ Power Attacker

card.name: Fire Blade
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ The crossed creature gets "speed attacker". ''(A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)''

card.name: Dreaming Moon Knife
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a card from your hand into your mana zone.

card.name: Raging Bamboo
card.text: ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Seventh Tower
card.text: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Metamorph

card.name: Emerald Claw
